backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend defining user profiles, electricians, work orders, job applications, and related types with access-control-gated query/update methods. Includes mixins for blob storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Defines the migration module that initializes a new `jobAlertSubscriptions` map when upgrading from the old actor state to the new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three job-board features (simplified apply flow, empty-state Join Us panel, and wired job alert subscription) to their implementing files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for what each component, page, hook, and utility does.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and OKLCH CSS custom properties for both light and dark themes, including sidebar, chart, and UI token variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'Technical Tech' and mounts the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with lazy-loaded page components, defining protected admin routes (dashboard, work orders, electricians, payments) and public routes (services, jobs, my-bookings, landing).
frontend/src/components/ApplicationStatu: Badge component that maps each `ApplicationProcessStatus` enum value to a color-coded label and CSS class for display in the UI.
frontend/src/components/AppSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component rendering Portal and Admin menu sections with active-state highlighting, dark styling, and the ElectroPro logo in the header.
frontend/src/components/JobApplicationSt: A multi-step progress indicator component that displays a progress bar, step dots, and labels for a job application flow based on current and total step counts.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: An empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component wrapping pages with a sidebar, sticky header containing login/logout button via Internet Identity, and an Outlet for nested routes.
A centered loading spinner with an animated pulse text, used as a fallback UI while content is loading.
frontend/src/components/PaymentStatusBad: A small badge component that displays a styled 'Paid' or 'Pending' label based on a PaymentStatus value.
frontend/src/components/PriorityBadge.ts: A small badge component that maps a numeric priority (1â€“4) to styled labels: Low, Medium, High, or Urgent.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A route guard component that shows a login prompt with Internet Identity if the user is unauthenticated, or renders child routes via Outlet if authenticated.
frontend/src/components/RatingDisplay.ts: A read-only star rating display component that renders filled, half-filled, or empty stars along with a numeric rating and optional review count.
frontend/src/components/RatingInput.tsx: An interactive star rating input component with hover effects and an optional comment textarea for submitting user reviews.
frontend/src/components/StatusBadge.tsx: A badge component that maps WorkOrderStatus values (open, inProgress, completed, cancelled) to styled label spans.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout state, and persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on electricians and work orders, wrapping backend actor calls with useQuery and useMutation and invalidating relevant caches on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useTranslation.ts: Provides a React context and hook for i18n, storing the selected language in sessionStorage and resolving translation strings with English fallback.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Exports a translations object containing English and Hindi string maps organized by UI section (nav, landing, services, jobBoard, etc.).
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS base styles, CSS custom properties for the dark-only theme (colors, radius, sidebar), and utility badge component classes for statuses and priorities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides utility functions for class merging, label/badge-class resolution for enums (status, priority, speciality), timestamp formatting, and electrician rating calculation from work orders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders an admin dashboard with summary stats (order counts, revenue, staff) and a recent-orders table, fetched via useGetAllWorkOrders and useGetAllElectricians hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Electricians.tsx: Displays a management page for electricians with CRUD operations (add, edit, delete) via dialogs, showing each electrician's rating calculated from work orders. Uses React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/JobBoard.tsx: Renders a public job board listing open work orders that authenticated workers can apply to, with search filtering, application tracking via localStorage, and job alert subscription support.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Static marketing landing page for the Technical Tech app featuring a hero banner, service feature pills, and navigation cards linking to the services and jobs pages.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: Shows the current user's work order bookings split into ongoing and past sections, with accept/decline actions and links to browse services if no bookings exist.
frontend/src/pages/Payments.tsx: Displays a payments dashboard with summary stats (total revenue, pending amounts, paid/pending counts) and allows authenticated users to edit payment details for individual work orders.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: A Services page that lets users select a repair service type (electronic, AC, fridge, electrician) and submit a work order form by choosing an electrician and filling in job details. Uses React Query hooks to fetch electricians and create work orders via the backend.
frontend/src/pages/WorkOrders.tsx: A WorkOrders management page displaying all work orders with filtering, search, and tabbed views, supporting actions like status updates, electrician assignment, payment updates, ratings, accept/decline, and application verification via dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback for persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Barlow Condensed, Inter), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, glow box shadows, and keyframe animations for accordion, fade, slide, and pulse effects.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a job marketplace app, tracking existing implemented features (simplified job application flow, empty-state 'Join Us' panel, subscription wiring) and pending new feature requests including backend job alert subscription storage.
